## Properties

| Property            | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `changeCallback`    | `change-callback` | Event triggered when a radio button inside change its state that returning the name of radio group and the value of radio button checked | `any`    | `undefined` |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`            | Name that identify this radio group                                                                                                      | `string` | `undefined` |
